name: the parkour square. [Beta]
description:
# Version 1.4 Out #

You're a parkour square that has to face obstacles and find a good strategy to take your parkour skills to the next level, be careful, there are some people who don't want you to do that and they will try everything to stop you from taking your parkour skills to the next level. But no one said it's going to be a easy task.

Download Status:

  • Windows 11 (?)
  • macOS (?)
  • Linux (?)
  • Android (Working)
  • WebGL (Working on some devices.)

(Beta Version.
